definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: We are going to have a test on Lesson Two next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 我們下週星期一要考第二課。

sentences.english: I'd like to drop by and see you sometime next week.
sentences.chinese: 我想在下週某個時候順便來看看你。

sentences.english: Please send them to this address before twelve o'clock next Monday.
sentences.chinese: 請於下週一12點前把它們送到這個地址。

sentences.english: If you are busy at all, we might come to talk to you sometime next week.
sentences.chinese: 如果你確實很忙，我們在下週某個時候來跟你說。

sentences.english: I am writing to find out the possibility of our having a brief meeting some time next week…
sentences.chinese: 我去信詢問一下我們能否在下週某個時間見面。

sentences.english: For the interest class date felt on a public holiday, the lesson will be proponed to a week later.
sentences.chinese: 凡課當日爲公衆假期，當日興趣班順延至下週舉行。

sentences.english: My next door neighbour is moving out next week.
sentences.chinese: 下週我隔壁的鄰居就要搬走了。

sentences.english: So, that's where we'll start when we think about Morrison next week.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們下週將Morrison時要先說的。

sentences.english: I'd like to drop in and see you sometime next week.
sentences.chinese: 我想在下週什麼時候順便來看看你。

sentences.english: I'll have a room free next week.
sentences.chinese: 下週我這裏會有一個房間可租。

sentences.english: In Washington, D. C. next week, I'm giving a talk about the Happiness Project.
sentences.chinese: 下週，華盛頓，我將進行一次快樂計劃的討論。

sentences.english: I will be working with Mr. Bai to complete the paper work this work or early next week.
sentences.chinese: 我將與白先生完成這項工作的文件工作或下週初。

sentences.english: I think I'm going to buy one, maybe next week.
sentences.chinese: 我打算去買下那一頂，也許下週就去。

sentences.english: Will those old schools be pulled down next week?
sentences.chinese: 那些老校是在下週拆除嗎？

sentences.english: The new economic policy will be made public early next week.
sentences.chinese: 新經濟政策將在下週初公佈。

sentences.english: Or,to put it more straightforwardly, next week the person that's me is the person with my soul.
sentences.chinese: 或更直接地說，下週是我的那個人，帶着我的靈魂。

definition: on the eve of/to be about to/to be on the verge of
foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
slot within a schedule/timeslot (for a TV program, a session with a photographer etc)/range of dates in which an event is to be held (film screening, exhibition etc)
